node.hospital_zh: 東區尤德夫人那打素醫院
node.detail_zh: 患者過往健康良好，3 月 1 日至 6 月 20 日曾到巴基斯坦，返港後由檢疫中心送院，沒有病徵。與第 #1136、#1138、#1146、#1159 及 #1160 宗個案患者有關連。
node.detail_en: The patient has good past health, was in Pakistan between March 1 and June 20, and was hospitalised from quarantine centre upon return to Hong Kong, having exhibited no symptoms. The patient's case is epidemiologically linked to those of patients #1136, #1138, #1146, #1159, and #1160.

node.location_zh: 阿聯酋航空 EK380（第 40 行）
